sentence.Network_en: He says they mistakenly believed the standard licenses they held were sufficient.
sentence.Network_cn: 他说他们曾经误以为有正规执照就足够了。

sentence.Network_en: She accepted that she had acted unwisely and mistakenly.
sentence.Network_cn: 她承认自己的举动是不明智和错误的。

sentence.Network_en: He mistakenly ascribes the expression "survival of the fittest" to Charles Darwin.
sentence.Network_cn: 他错误地认为“适者生存”是查尔斯·达尔文说的。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 新编大学英语单词表(第三册) - 豆丁网 ... initiate v. 开始，发起 mistakenly ad. 错误地，误解地 objectively ad. 客观地.
英文写作副词（已更新）_小豪_新浪博客 ... 22. rapidly 迅速的，立即 23. mistakenly 错误地;被误解地 25.previously 事先;以前.

list.abs: When he mistakenly judged that the international situation was favorable to him , he rejected negotiation ., 当他错误判断国际形势对他有利时 , 就不再商谈.
the seafarer mistakenly believed the false intention made by the employer , and signed the contract , which was likely to cause damage to the seafarers .二订定雇佣契约时，雇用人为虚伪意思表示，使船员误信而有受损害之虞者。
cozy-cozy regular visits abroad on business , and many people mistakenly believe that he is the Japanese .王若雄经常出国考察、洽谈业务，不少人误认为他是日本人。
relations awareness unclear , leading to people mistakenly believe that to be fully privatized housing to live can only dream .但由于对住房关系认识不清，导致人们误认为，住房要全面私有化，要居住就只能买房。

I thought gradually I mistakenly , because these shop you were actually cannot stroll , but at nonchalant time , always could give you pleasantly surprised glistening .渐渐地我觉得我错了，因为那些小店其实你是逛不完，而在不经意的时候，总是会给你惊喜的闪亮。
I mistakenly believed that if I did not preach with power and persuasion , the congregation would fade away and the church would fold .我误以为我的讲道若没有强大的说服力，会众就会离开，教会也不会成长。

entry.def: If you are mistaken about something, you are wrong about it.

example.ex: I see I was mistaken about you...
example.tran: 我明白我以前错怪你了。

example.ex: You couldn't be more mistaken, Alex. You've utterly misread the situation.
example.tran: 亚历克斯，你真是大错特错，你对局势的判断根本不对。

entry.def: A mistaken belief or opinion is incorrect.

example.ex: I had a mistaken view of what was happening.
example.tran: 我对当时发生的事情曾有一种错误的认识。

example.ex: ...a limited understanding of addiction and mistaken beliefs about how it can be overcome.
example.tran: 对上瘾的有限认识和关于如何将其戒除的错误观念

auth_sentence.content: Sometimes mistakenly referred to as a "lamppost".
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sometimes mistakenly referred to as a "lamppost".

auth_sentence.content: I mistakenly thought the Bryans were online as well.
auth_sentence.res_content: I mistakenly thought the Bryans were online as well.

Sentence.sentence: They clearly saw the man who attacked them, yet they mistakenly identified an innocent person.

sentences.en: I was mistakenly assumed to be a Welshman because of my surname.
sentences.cn: 由于我的姓的缘故,我被误认为是威尔士人。
